website_summaries.verdict: Attractive wood folding chairs for those who want a more natural look when providing extra seating.
cons: Not as sturdy as some metal models

customer_reviews.title: Like the chairs: right color, fully assembled
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Winsome Wood chairs that arrived quickly, via Prime. The natural color perfectly matches light-color wood of our table (purchased via Amazon from another manufacturer), which is why we picked them, but you never know how closely the actual product will match the photos. It was spot-on. The chairs come fully assembled, ready to use as soon as you pull them out of the box. They seem well-made. Manufacturer's caution note says they NOT for outside use, with a maximum weight of 170 pounds (I'm about 20 pounds over that, and feel perfectly secure sitting in them).
customer_reviews.author: Keys Cuda

customer_reviews.title: Decent chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are ok. The finish could be better. My major problem with these chairs, is attached to the bottom of EVERY chair are warning/safety instructions that have been entirely glued to the full length of one of the slats. Also the paper it slightly wider than the slat so it’s visible from the top of the seat if not removed. I tried to remove it and it came off in pieces. I will have to get adhesive remover to get it off. It’s completely unnecessary. A paper in the box would have been sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Agoesman1

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy folding chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are even nicer than my husband and I thought they would be! They are quite solidly built and, with an added seat cushion, will stand in perfectly as extra dining table chairs. I have attached a photo of how they look at a standard, 60" long table.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, nicely made... Since I live in a 550 sq. ft. loft so these work great in small spaces. They are easy to store in a closet and two folded chairs, stacked on top of one another, come to about 6" high so you could potentially store them under a bed. They are a light color of wood. I bought these to go with the "Winsome Wood 42-Inch Round Drop Leaf Table" and the chairs match the height, however, the color of wood is lighter than the Winsome table. I'm not picky so it all worked for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Trepte

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the loose screws, and staples on the legs.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs have a few draw backs. The screws comes loose easily. Therefore, if you are not checking them frequently, potentially painful accidents may occur. Due to the loosely screws, the chairs do not feel very solid, especially if kids rock them side to side. The small round plastics each of the legs breaks and comes off easily. Worse, the staple stays on the legs and scratches the hardwood floor. These chairs are light, good when you move them around, bad because they are not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tickles

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased but one mishap
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be high-quality, sturdy, easy to setup. They might be a bit heavy to lug around for some folks, depending on how/where they are stored. But we've been pleased with them. Did have one incident where a guest stood up during a gaming session and the chair folded and fell underneath them. But that has only happened once so far, and I suspect the guests calf caught the chair as he stood up. If that turns out to be a freak accident, I will be pleased with the overall value.
customer_reviews.author: A. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Basic folding wood chair. Hardware is solid enough - not cheap, not top quality, quality of the build satisfactory. It's a slightly smallish and slightly flat-ish feeling chair. Fine for what we use it for which is garden party and barbecue seating in the back yard. They stack nicely, fold easily, and are light enough to carry several at a time. I reserve five stars for real best-in-show and really impressive quality - these are still in the category of economy chairs. But they are the best in that category that I've seen recently.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Ryan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these four chairs two years ago at Thanksgiving. We use them a LOT because we have weekly family dinners that usually require breaking out the folding chairs. So far they have shown almost no wear and tear, are reasonably comfortable, and, best of all, they are NOT PLASTIC as I loathe to add to the mountains of broken plastic stuff that litter our planet. I consider them a very good purchase, and I’m back here to buy more (you know, Thanksgiving again).
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Fatally Flawes
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are sturdy and handsome enough for folding chairs, but only work for outdoor use. I’ve used them indoors on a few occasions and they have left huge scratches in my floor. The first time I thought it was just that some of the rubber feet had fallen off, but subsequent use shows that rubber feet or no, these scratch floors.
customer_reviews.author: waetherman

customer_reviews.title: For the price they look good and accomplish it’s purpose
customer_reviews.text: I really like them because they don’t look like a folding chair. And they are sturdy enough for a person of 170lbs maybe a little more. But they are not sturdy enough to slide out from the table while sitting on the chair, because it feels like is going to break apart or you end up folding the legs back to the storage position. But in general they accomplish they purpose, they look good and help you to save some space if you are not using all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Itzel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the sturdiness and quality of these chairs. Exceptionally sturdy. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: DianeB

customer_reviews.title: Great extra seating
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these sets to use for a large birthday party and for future holidays, etc. They serve their purpose well and were fairly comfortable. I wouldn't expect them to hold up to heavy use or offer them to very heavyset guests, but they are perfect for around a kids table.
customer_reviews.author: MI Book Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not for long term use
customer_reviews.text: They looked great but you cannot tighten bolts. Today I have one left. The chairs wobble and break easily not for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am really happy with these chairs. They were packaged extremely well and arrived without a single scratch. They seem to be very sturdy and they look really nice. I also got tray tables from the same manufacturer and they are a perfect match. The downside is, although they are strong enough to bear the weight of my husband (he's around 270 lbs) the seat is not very wide and he barely fits - so one star less than perfect for me. For most of our family though - or any average size adult - these are really great chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Elegant wood dining chairs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful natural wood folding chairs. We liked them so much that they are our permanent dining chairs and we bought a second set to use two as office chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, great buy. :--)
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. Bought for Thanksgiving as extra seating for the folding table, worked great. Easy to store, sturdy. EXCELLENT packaging! - mostly cardboard, cleverly cut & folded to brace & protect. Arrived in perfect condition. Recyclable packaging is a wonderful bonus. 👍
customer_reviews.author: terry pride, apdt#1827/CVA

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken!
customer_reviews.text: I am so unhappy right now. These chairs arrived today and two of them are completely broken. The legs were cracked off! I am not sure if it's the quality of the chairs or the negligence of the delivery person. I am sending them back for a replacement and hoping the new ones will be intact.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal L. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all - Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Supper wobbly. Very cheap material. I ordered a second set just in case but the second one was just a wobbly as the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Lupita Perez

customer_reviews.title: The Best Out There
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value and quality. The wood is finished very nicely and looks just like the photos you seen on here. The seats are sturdy and very comfortable. Also, very easy to fold and stow away.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Look great for the price but short on comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look really nice. Unfortunately they are rather flimsy. They are small and would probably be fine for children but I'm not sure how they will stand up to adult use. Additionally they are very uncomfortable. I can't give them a lower rating because the price is really out of this world!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and perfect for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: These are so classy and affordable! My neighbors and I all went in on a set, so we have 16 to rotate around for parties. They are sturdy and perfect for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: ok chair, too high
customer_reviews.text: height from floor to seat was 2 inches higher than advertised - slightly uncomfortable. A little wobly but nice material and average price.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: very nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are well made and store so compactly. So nice to have them when extra company is coming for dinner as is common on Christmas, Thanks Giving and New Years. The price was certainly very fair and the quality seems to be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable but good deal for extra seating
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are a wonderful deal for the price. However I would warn anyone that wants to buy them, they are not very comfortable. If you're looking to use them as just some extra seating for parties, they're a good option. But they should definitely not be your mainstay dining room chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Fit my need and budget bad shipper
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and is working for its intended purpose. Although shipping box was damaged shipper rang doorbell and left.There was minor damage to two of the chairs no reason to return but I do want to manufacture to know how they were received so that they can handle things on their end and anybody else who purchases doesn’t have to deal with what could possibly have been a return.
customer_reviews.author: James D Rosser Jr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, comfortable for short duration seating
customer_reviews.text: These look cute and were a great price for wooden chairs. I enjoy using them when I need more seating in my home. They can be a bit uncomfortable to sit on for long periods of time, even though I added some chair cushions from IKEA.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Robin 4-PC Folding Chair Set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for both my sons and they are really nice extra chairs....not too comfortable, but with cushions it would be. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!!
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were beyond my expectations for the price. Good, sturdy, nice looking wood chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent guest chairs, SCRAPE kitchen tiles!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, good price for quick guest chairs but started getting wobbly and falling apart after a year. Also started scraping my kitchen tiles even with rubber caps on leg bottoms!
customer_reviews.author: Misha Shatravka

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable, I would definitely recommend a little pillow if ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable, I would definitely recommend a little pillow if you have bare legs. But they are very cute and a great space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chairs. I can use them indoors or out on my patio. They are ready to use right out of the box and fold nicely to store.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are great chairs at a very good price. I bought two sets to use around tables at a large outdoor party and they dressed up our patio with the addition of matching cushions. They are very well-made, fold easily and are sturdy. I would definitely recommend putting cushions on them to make them more comfortable - but others thought they were fine without them. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tomboysuze

customer_reviews.title: Not the best!
customer_reviews.text: 2 chairs are cracked!!! All feel a little shaky!!! Tighten screws, but still shaky. I recommend spending a little extra on something better. I'm not going to send them back bc the process takes forever, Im just going to repair myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: we got these to go with our 5th wheel for extra seating. we have a small table with only 2 chairs.
customer_reviews.author: lillian jonte

customer_reviews.title: Handy Folding Chairs
customer_reviews.text: The wood seems solid and the chairs appear sturdy. These were ordered to supplement similar folding wood slat chairs bought a few years ago from Sears. The ones from Amazon are almost a perfect match. The chairs from Amazon cost more, but shipping was included.
customer_reviews.author: proper shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! They are so much better than your regular plastic folding chairs and are right around the same price point. I may actually order a second set. I just wish I could order single units instead of a set of four.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: Super find! lightweight and compact so they can be stored away in the closet, but still very durable for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, terrific service from the supplier.
customer_reviews.text: These are great folding chairs. I have slipcovers over them and paired them with my glass dining room table. A big shout out to Winsome Wood - fabulous service on replacing a damaged chair. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca l.

customer_reviews.title: They Open, They Close, They Good
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these chairs. I've had them in house with children for over 6 months now and they still look like new. We use them regularly. They are made well and have an understated charm that I really appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: myselfasme

customer_reviews.title: Not so good :-(
customer_reviews.text: One of the chairs broke while my husband was sitting on it and hurt his back. They were alright up until one broke :-/
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs got them to go with Winsome Wood Groveland Square Dining Table. They match so well. Chair are comfortable too and even more so with Ikea Malinda Chair Cushions. All though Amazon. I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for extra seating for large family function
customer_reviews.author: Amar67

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality wooden chairs. Just pull them out the box and sit on them, which was great. They are comfortable but did purchase 15" chair pads for extra comfort and color.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jones

customer_reviews.title: good for extra chairs or outdoors
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are sturdy and well made. The back is not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Evgenia Maropoulos

customer_reviews.title: Look great but not as comfortable as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: They look great. Not as comfortable as I had hoped but they will do just fine for the price. Purchased tie on cushions and they helped a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs for a dinner party we had on our roof in Manhattan. They worked great for that purpose, but now we have them folded up in our living room, and they've come in handy for multiple purposes since then. They are extremely well-constructed and look very nice. I highly recommend these folding chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The seats are VERY small
customer_reviews.text: The seats on these chairs are uncomfortably small. The chairs seem well made, but are not comfortable since the length of the seats is so short. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Ratner

customer_reviews.title: I bought cushions so that during people would be more comfortable during dinner
customer_reviews.text: The price is fabulous for four, solid wood chairs used as additional dining seating. I bought cushions so that during people would be more comfortable during dinner.
customer_reviews.author: neddy

customer_reviews.title: Real Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, assembled and ready to go. Added pads. Great chairs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michael McLellan

customer_reviews.title: ... to side even tho they are heavy and fell sturdy they are not
customer_reviews.text: the chairs are wobbly sided to side even tho they are heavy and fell sturdy they are not. afraid to let guests sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: A Baker Person

customer_reviews.title: Good size chairs, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Nice extra seating. Folds into a nice compact set that doesnt take up too much storage area. We keep this set in the back of the hall closet.
customer_reviews.author: NonnieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Easy to store. Small so good for kids or slim adults
customer_reviews.author: Mithra Asadi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chairs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Well made chairs and they don’t look like other crappy plastic folding chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, very solid chairs, arrived on time, well-packed and completely assembled. Guests weighed up to 190, and these held up with no problem. Nice natural wood color.
customer_reviews.author: Irish4TW

customer_reviews.title: Fold up and stash away
customer_reviews.text: They are strong and fold up easily... love them 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: ivy b jasset

customer_reviews.title: Wood is lovely - but screws become loose VERY quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Wood is lovely - but screws become loose VERY quickly. They have some odd hexagonal screw shape you must go buy, too - and it's not included with the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: HRS

customer_reviews.title: Good Chairs for Occasional Use
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. However, I don't think these chairs will hold up to constant use. But, for holidays, overflow seating and occasional use; they should work just fine. If you need to rent chairs several times a year, these will pay for themselves after a year or so. I purchased 16 and they store easily in a corner in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made folding chairs. They add so much more ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made folding chairs. They add so much more class than a plastic folding chair and take up just as much storage room. I'll buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.AJackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for dinner parties
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs! Easy to use and lightweight to store/move about.
customer_reviews.author: handsomehansdog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect extra chairs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect extra chairs. Good size and weight. Made some seat and back cushions to dress up for Christmas dinner. Will be using them again this holiday season. Easily folded and fit in my hall coat closet. I got four.
customer_reviews.author: Lynele

customer_reviews.title: Good, functional chair
customer_reviews.text: Good, functional chairs. Solid wood, and fold/carry easily. They're comfortable and work as I need them to. they're well made, so I expect a good life out of them.
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price !!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to add to (2) sets I purchased a few years ago...not exactly the same but I love them. Do a lot of sit down dinner parties and these really come in handy for extra seating. Had seat and back cushions made (matching the originals) for more comfort. Arrived on time, packaged securely .... Definitely recommend these !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget M.

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT value!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are a fantastic value. They are stable, more than reasonably comfortable for holiday guests, and relatively attractive. We will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: DhunterB

customer_reviews.title: I really love the versatility of these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I really love the versatility of these chairs. They pulled up very easily and store nicely in the small space. These are so much better than full non-folding chairs for our small kitchen. They are made a very high quality wood and are very sturdy. The only thing I wish they would change about this product is I wish that the chairs would lock in the open position. They are actually very comfortable as well. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking to save space in their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chairs for Price
customer_reviews.text: This are fairly comfortable folding chairs, which are appropriate as extra chairs for overflow dinner guests, etc. They are surprising well built and nicely finished at this price point. In fact, I don't know that you could do better for twenty-three bucks a chair at today's price.
customer_reviews.author: bennettlo

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are small, but very nice for guests and events where more seating is needed. They are sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Olytown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to Extend Thanksgiving Table
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed to accommodate extra guests at Thanksgiving. Sturdy, well made. I bought thin cushions just to make them that much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend taking them inside though as they do not hold up in the outside weather.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are exactly what I was looking for. They’re very easy to store and take up very little space, as I live in a tiny one bedroom apartment and rarely have guests. They are not very sturdy, but for occasional use they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Guderian

customer_reviews.title: great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great folding chairs for the price. These are great because they take up so little space to store and provide extra seating when we need them. They're not comfortable to sit in for a long time, but they're perfect for having extra chars on the patio or for a casual party.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaM

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Wood Folding Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These folding wood chairs are wonderful! Perfect when extra seating is needed at my dinning table. They are easy to open and fold back up. I do wish they had a storage stand so I could leave them in my dinning room. But I can slide them under a bed.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Queen

customer_reviews.title: MADE SOLID
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are solid, strong, made of high quality material and workmanship. I will definitely be buying more of these for our new cafe set-up at church.
customer_reviews.author: Kali St-Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, good quality, looks better in person than in the picture. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and very solid and comfy. No assembly. Thank goodness!!
customer_reviews.author: Shoard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs, no assembly required. Roughly match a natural finish table I just bought from Ikea. These are great if you have a table that you don't really use and want to put the chairs you aren't using away!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Minimalist design yet elegant! Very well made, comfortable and sturdy! They look even better in person! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. Sturdy enough. I was worried about toddler's fingers and chairs folding up. Silly. I am pleased I bought these chairs. Pretty natural wood. No assembly come in box of four.
customer_reviews.author: leighlew

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, planned to return because I get two other ikea chairs before it arrived. But it is good so I guess I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these chairs!! They are beautiful and functional and work for whenever we have extra people to our home! Only negative is the warning sticker on the underside of the seat could be a bit slimmer, or not leave a paper residue on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these chairs. They are quite sturdy and comfortable even for an above average sized person, such as myself.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Look Nice
customer_reviews.text: Some of the edges were rough and not as sturdy as some similar chairs I have. They do look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Perry

customer_reviews.title: good overall product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy, comfortable, fit in the closet when not being used. Good overall
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for extra seating at my Thanksgiving dinner
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for extra seating at my Thanksgiving dinner, and definitely are an upgrade from plastic chairs. These chairs are sturdy and moderately comfortable. The feet did scratch my wooden floors a bit so I added felt.
customer_reviews.author: Ilan

customer_reviews.title: the chairs are perfect for what I needed and match my tiny table
customer_reviews.text: the chairs are perfect for what I needed and match my tiny table. They are very stursy, nicely made and finished-packed extra well. As always Amazon comes through with just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Edith E. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Five stars ya'll
customer_reviews.text: I've used these as dining room chairs and just as extra folding chairs for guests. The wood looks really nice. I'm really satisfied with the chairs, and I think the price is totally reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy good quality and I didn't have to put them together. Arrived at the moment I needed them too! Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: cathynmerlin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy quality, especially for the price. Good finish, comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are a great value. They are light weight and much lovelier ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are a great value. They are light weight and much lovelier than plastic folding chairs. I bought them when we had extra guests for a dinner party and ended up using them every day. So far I have no complalints.
customer_reviews.author: JulieN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hardwood construction is sturdy, attractive, and functional, without taking up much storage space when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs for a great price. Easy to move, easy to store. 4 chairs, when folded, take up about 10 inches of space.
customer_reviews.author: Uncl Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra chair.
customer_reviews.text: Use in dining room with family and friends. Sturdy and easy storing. Look good with maple table and chairs
customer_reviews.author: Deb Fleming

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are a good size, they are attractive and good for the ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are a good size, they are attractive and good for the price, but they twist slightly when you sit on them. I weight 180, my family less than that- they might break. I hope not.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good, useful and cheap It is worth if you buy it
customer_reviews.author: Feiwen Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for extra sitting but definitely for small people
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs for extra sitting but definitely for small people. Taller and heavier people would be very uncomfortable. I love the way they fold and barely take any space.
customer_reviews.author: jose  rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: But they fold up nicely and are pretty good for their price
customer_reviews.text: We had to send back the first order due to a broken chair. They're a lot flimsier than I imagined, they can't handle much wear or wiggling, be sure to use on a flat surface. But they fold up nicely and are pretty good for their price!
customer_reviews.author: rocket

customer_reviews.title: and were good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These chairs met all expectations, and were good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very decent wood folding chairs, and pretty comfortable. Joints are a bit stiff new but will probably loosen with age. Not the nicest I've used but definitely good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seats way too small...only 15x15.. ? And very tough to find seat cushuons to fit! Tempyt
customer_reviews.author: addictedtoreading

customer_reviews.title: Removed the chairs from the box and was amazed that they were already assembled
customer_reviews.text: Fast turn around, received these chairs a day early. Removed the chairs from the box and was amazed that they were already assembled. Chairs are really durable with great quality wood. Very pleased with my purchase!
